entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
